attributes.action: Change to temporary online schooling for January 2022 to save NHS from Omicron
attributes.additional_details: To save NHS and the people of the UK from the Omicron virus
attributes.background: Make schooling online at least for January 2022

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Close schools and bring back online learning until the end of Jan 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599364

Close schools and colleges and replace exams with teacher assessed grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603955
